snippet.title: 0-Kara no Mahjong: Mahjong Youchien - Tamago Gumi [Playstation 1] One Hour of Gameplay
snippet.description:
Enjoy one hour of gameplay of me playing the PlayStation 1 game 0-Kara no Mahjong: Mahjong Youchien - Tamago Gumi. Keep in mind.... I do NOT know how to play Mahjong... nor can I speak or read Japanese. So have a few chuckles at my feeble attempt to play Mahjong.

This game was developed by AFFECT and published by GUNGHO. It was released in Japan on March 12th 1998. It also had a North American digital release on the PlayStation 3 store (as a PSOne Classic) on April 9th 2013 (under the title Mahjong Youchien: Tamago Gumi). 

MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION:
Mahjong from beginner to advanced, to allow according to their level of study is divided into five classes. Mahjong tiles type, the type of role, the number of calculations, you can learn a wide range of formulas more mahjong. Also, learn the game of Mahjong fun with us in a unique character.

FEATURES:
 - First person perspective.
 - 2D graphics
 - Cartoon graphics
 - Mahjong theme.

Date Captured: Sunday, March 3rd 2024
Capture Device: Elgato HD60 S
Editing Software: Pinnacle Studio 24 Ultimate

#mahjong 
#ps1 
#0kara
#playstation 
#gameplay
